name: Defence of the Realm
description: The Imam has demanded the utmost protection for our new realm. We need to get the right people into the right positions as a good start. All branches of the military including the army, the navy, and we need to develop an air force at some point.

name: Rebuild the Omani Royal Navy
description: The Omani Navy is a decrepit, out of date mess of Weltkrieg ships. We need to see what we can salvage and update our naval training for the more modern ships we are planning on including in our new trade fleet.

name: Muscat Dockyards
description: A new navy needs to a new shipyard for construction. Let's set the concrete for the docks and erect cranes for the glory of God!

name: The New Merchant Fleet
description: Our trade vessels are full of holes and can't hold nearly the cargo our burgeoning society needs to import. Let's commission a fleet of 20 new ships that can ply the world's waters to build up Oman!

name: Foreign Naval Officers
description: Just because we have the ships doesn't mean we know how to use them. Let's offer a high salary to a few foreign officers who can teach our sailors how to make the best use of our new navy!

name: Royal Army Reform
description: What remains of our army was designed to deal with tribal uprisings, not the larger scale warfare we seem to be moving to. We need to reform our units to deal with large-scale engagements.

name: The Northern Threat
description: Be it Saudi's or others, those to the North have always had designs on the entire Arabian Peninsula. Let's fortify the obvious areas of attack to deter potential aggression.

name: Muscat Armament Plan
description: We have a plan for how our ground forces will engage the enemy, but they will need arms to do so. We need a new factory dedicated to producing military hardware for our divisions.

name: Artillery Purchases
description: Guns only shoot so far. Fighting on the open ground of the desert we need long range artillery to destroy enemy forces before they engage ours. The best way to acquire this is petition a foreign government for prototypes.

name: Infantry Equipment Reorganisation
description: The Weltkrieg rifles our units are currently using are breaking down in the field, and our diplomats have come back with far more advanced weapons from other countries. It's time to update our equipment from at least this decade.

name: Dealing with Tribal Militias
description: The tribes in the outlying desert areas have been sapping our manpower and state support for too long. They need to be dealt with, and swiftly, if we are to get our armed forces into fighting shape.

name: Regular Regiments
description: Our former tribal units are equipped with a wide variety of arms and sundries. This has made it expensive to re-equip regiments in the field, as we don't always know what they need. Standardising a field kit will increase the effectiveness of our units and reduce attrition, since we can pick and choose the best for our men.

name: Military Hierarchy Reorganisation
description: We need to have a better top-down organisation of our chain of command, to better facilitate fast, accurate decision making. Having a few people make the major decisions, and implement our grand strategy is the best way to do this.

name: Indian Advisers
description: India's troops have to fight long and hard in conditions that are at least as poor as our own. Let's invite a few advisers from South Asia to increase the organisation of our troops.

name: Persian Advisers
description: [PER.GetNameDefCap] has fought in terrain similar to our own for centuries, and they have survived Annexation for decades. Let's invite [PER.GetAdjective] advisers and see if they can teach this resiliency to our troops.

name: Omani Royal Air Force
description: We have heard tale of how planes changed the face of the Weltkrieg, and seen German planes buzzing through the desert sun. Maybe it's time we invest into an air force of our own.

name: Urban AA Defences
description: With few places of high population concentration in our country, a concentrated air assault on our urban areas could be devastating. We need to find way to protect ourselves from such an onslaught.

name: Aerial Training
description: The few planes we do have don't know how to work together toward a common objective. We have to train our pilots using common techniques, and standardise our flying formations.

name: Foreign Fighter Purchases
description: We don't have the necessary resources to design our own planes from scratch. Send a few advisers abroad to look at foreign designs, and try to copy the best one for the Imam's air force!

name: Administrative Reform
description: If we are to administer all the outlying desert areas and the myriad tribes that reside there, we are going to have to expand and reorganise our ancient bureaucracy. While not cheap, we will reap the benefits for years to come.

name: Tax Reform
description: We need to standardise the way we collect taxes from the populace, and potentially separate it from the tithe's the Imam collects. While this reform will be initially expensive, it will pay itself off in a few short years, and we desperately need to invest in the future of our country.

name: Commence Economic Reorganisation
description: Vast tracts of land are under the protection of the Imam and other members of our oligarchy. If we open this land up for business development, our best entrepreneurial minds will find the best use

name: Educational Reform
description: Other than attending the mosque a couple times a week, most people in our country have no access to education, and few can read. If we are to continue the reforms of Oman, we need a literate, intelligent population to implement our agenda, and come up with new ideas.

name: Muscat Airstrip
description: To improve transportation for our increasingly modern government, and facilitate an expansion of our military air force, let's build a new air strip outside the capital of Muscat.

name: Foreign Blueprints
description: As our advisers and diplomats continue to travel the globe promoting our country and researching in it's best interests, let's continue to make use of the best of what we find around the world.

name: Incorporate the Hinterlands
description: Regular clinic and schools, road improvements and the like will persuade the outlying areas that they are a valued member of the Imam's family. We can worry about how we will pay for it later, it's important to bring the entire country together now.

name: Tax Inner Yemen
description: Now that we have a standardised tax system, we need to get our collectors out from the urban areas, into outlying villages and tribal areas in the desert. Incorporating the outlying areas wasn't cheap, and they have to bear so me of the burden.

name: Call Banners from the Hinterlands
description: If we only recruit our armies from the coastal regions of our country, we are missing out on a huge proportion of manpower. We should call in the banners of the largest tribal warlords to augment our armed forces.

name: Kneel the Imam
description: We have tribal warlords, rich business leaders, and powerful religious figures all doing what they want, destabilising our great nation. We have shown the people of Oman our beneficence, now these major leaders of Oman shall show us the deference we deserve and bend the knee to the Imam.

name: Budget Recovery
description: Our budget has been decimated by the aftereffects of Black Monday. We need to implement some austerity measures to recover enough funds to make sure necessary state functions continue working. We will have to re-balance this in the future, but we need to get things working now.

name: Budget Re-balancing
description: Now that our budget is at least sort of recovered, we need to re-balance how our money is spent between military pursuits, and nation building. We need to set our priorities and fund those first, and worry about extraneous budget items later.

name: Budget Rebuilding
description: Now that the economy of Oman is humming along, we can take the profits of our national industry, and re-invest them into healthcare and training for our workers. This will need to not just more output for our companies, but more efficient output as well.

name: Muscat Railway Company
description: The industrial revolution largely passed Oman by in the 19th century, and we are determined to catch it ourselves in the 20th. Lets found a solid state company for managing rail networks, and lay the ties for the first line through the capital to some outlying areas immediately.

name: Dhofar Railway
description: Now that we have at least one major rail line though Muscat itself, we need to integrate the rest of Oman with this rail line. Goods and citizens from as far away as Dohfar will be able to get across the entire country in less than a day's travel. Of course this stands to benefit our military as well, as faster transportation means faster troops!

name: Port of Muscat
description: We have always been a sea trading society, and while our rail makes moving products easier in country, the real profit comes from when we export goods by sea. Connecting the rail lines to the seaways, and building infrastructure to facilitate transportation between them, will really get our economy flowing!

name: Local Manufacturer Incentive
description: We need to provide local incentives in Oman to utilise all the spare labor the state cannot effectively utilise. Manufacturing all the small things citizens need, including appliances and tools, cheap clothing and the like, will reduce our imports and expand our trading opportunities with our trade partners.

name: Commercial Industries Plan
description: Providing incentives to small military manufacturing companies will allow them to expand their production base, speeding up the process of industrialising the process of manufacturing military vehicles and small arms. We need more military factories if we are to keep up with out increasingly aggressive neighbours!

name: Intensify Industrial Initiatives
description: We are confident that with our current industrial plan we will be able to expand our military capacity in an adequate fashion. It still remains to be seen if we can keep up with an increasing middle class and their ever larger demand for commercial goods. To keep the people pacified, let's provide the same incentives to civilian companies that we do to military ones.

name: Finish Economic Plan
description: We can finally reap the efforts of our years long reform effort in our country. With improved transportation, support for expanded civilian and military factories, and an increased capacity to trade, our economy is humming along, and we continue to add capacity as time goes along.

name: Compromises for Our Freedom
description: We are surrounded by hostile forces on the entire peninsula. We will have to make some compromises if we want to survive the coming decade.

name: Persian Protection
description: Persia has a vested interest in an ally on the Arabian Peninsula, so will be a good candidate to ask for some protection against our enemies. Better a close ally than one far away like Egypt or India.

name: Imperial Army Officers
description: Persia has demanded that in return for our protection, they be able to embed a small amount of their officers into all the units of our army. While this will give us much needed experience, the people won't like it that much. Still, sacrifices have to be made if we are to weather the coming storm.

name: Equipment Efforts
description: A relationship with a major regional power has the benefit of military training exercises, and even better observation of their military hardware. Let's take these experiences back to our R&D team and improve the working designs of our military vehicles.

name: Prepare to Resist
description: We know they are coming, it's just a matter of when now. We need to prepare every man to defend the land we have worked so hard to improve and expand upon. FOR THE IMAM!

name: Call Upon the Raj
description: India has worked with the Entente to secure the rest of their country. We have a common experience with India, let's petition them, and the Entente, for help from the outside forces that are assembling against us.

name: Join the ISAC
description: Canada has offered us a place in the Imperial Scientific and Academic Council. It's a prestigious organisation, and our research and development team is salivating at the prospect of getting access to a global supply of new ideas and prototypes.

name: Royal Navy Cooperation
description: Canada is now leading the Entente, and focusing on building larger ships of the line. They have offered to help us with the technology of building destroyers cheaper, and more efficiently than we thought possible. We need to do our part to support the alliance that is keeping us from ultimate destruction.

name: A Special Relationship
description: India has offered to help us run our government in a way that will benefit the Entente. We hesitate at such a bargain in return for our freedom, but the alternative, total annihilation, is not a real option. Let us bend the knee to India in return for our freedom! Others will not be so kind, and they will let the Imam keep his place as the head of state.
